name: Naveen Kumar
bio: I design and build elegant, logical web and mobile experiences. Turning complex ideas into seamless, intuitive solutions.
about:
I’m a B.Tech graduate in Computer Science with a passion for building intelligent, scalable, and user-focused digital products. I’ve built over 60+ projects—ranging from full-stack web apps and Android applications to AI/ML systems—spanning personal projects, internships, freelance work, and hackathons. Along the way, I’ve published research on Hospital Acquired Infections and continuously explored the deeper layers of software engineering, machine learning, and AI.
I remain driven by a single goal: to create technology that works flawlessly, scales effortlessly, and makes a lasting impact.
